description: Detects potential NT API stub patching as seen used by the project PatchingAPI
author: frack113
name: Potential NT API Stub Patching
query: ((winlog.event_data.GrantedAccess:"0x1FFFFF" AND winlog.event_data.CallTrace:C\:\\Windows\\SYSTEM32\\ntdll.dll\+* AND winlog.event_data.CallTrace:*|UNKNOWN\(* AND winlog.event_data.CallTrace:*\)) AND (NOT (((process.executable.text:(C\:\\Program\ Files\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\System32\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\*) AND winlog.event_data.TargetImage:(C\:\\Program\ Files\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\System32\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\*))) OR ((process.executable.text:C\:\\Windows\\Temp\\asgard2\-agent\\* AND process.executable.text:*\\thor64.exe)) OR ((process.executable.text:C\:\\Users\\* AND process.executable.text:*\\AppData\\Local\\GitHubDesktop\\app\-* AND process.executable.text:(*\\GitHubDesktop.exe OR *\\resources\\app\\git\\usr\\bin\\sh.exe) AND winlog.event_data.TargetImage:C\:\\Users\\* AND winlog.event_data.TargetImage:*\\AppData\\Local\\GitHubDesktop\\app\-*)) OR ((process.executable.text:(C\:\\Windows\\Microsoft.NET\\Framework\\v* OR C\:\\Windows\\Microsoft.NET\\Framework64\\v*) AND process.executable.text:*\\NGenTask.exe AND winlog.event_data.TargetImage:(C\:\\Windows\\Microsoft.NET\\Framework\\v* OR C\:\\Windows\\Microsoft.NET\\Framework64\\v*))) OR ((process.executable.text:("C:\WINDOWS\system32\taskhostw.exe" OR "C:\Windows\system32\taskhost.exe") AND winlog.event_data.TargetImage:(C\:\\Windows\\Microsoft.NET\\Framework\\v* OR C\:\\Windows\\Microsoft.NET\\Framework64\\v*) AND winlog.event_data.TargetImage:*\\NGenTask.exe)) OR ((process.executable.text:C\:\\Users\\* AND process.executable.text:*\\AppData\\Local\\Microsoft\\Teams\\stage\\Teams.exe AND winlog.event_data.TargetImage:C\:\\Users\\* AND winlog.event_data.TargetImage:*\\AppData\\Local\\Microsoft\\Teams\\Update.exe)) OR ((process.executable.text:C\:\\Users\\* AND process.executable.text:*\\AppData\\Local\\Microsoft\\Teams\\Update.exe AND winlog.event_data.TargetImage:"C:\WINDOWS\SysWOW64\regsvr32.exe")) OR ((process.executable.text:C\:\\Users\\* AND process.executable.text:*\\AppData\\Local\\Microsoft\\Teams\\Update.exe AND winlog.event_data.TargetImage:*\\AppData\\Local\\Microsoft\\Teams\\stage\\Teams.exe)))))
